notes.text:
Faced alot of ca, backrow hate dinos (like the one that placed well in the meta weekly), dark magcians , and hella weevil 

The key thing I did to win fast were VERY VERY EARLY storm plays, often if I would open storm / gozuki or sam skull / insight / another backrow (like wall of d), I'd storm off everything leaving my opp without any backrow and putting them in a top deck situation, while i had a live spirit, gozuki / sam skull, bacon in grave and other backrow to protect if I had it.

And of course econ is the mvp - econ take for game, or econ change battle position for game.  Also don't forget to check for kuriboh! I got lazy one time and it backfired
